NEARLY 2,000 STUDENTS ENROLLED IN MY UDEMY COURSES!

Did you know that videos have become the number one means to communicate with our target audience? Did you know that on line videos are your best chance of reaching the top of Google? They are indeed better than any other marketing tool you can use to sell your product or get the exposure you want for your website. Videos are being successfully used by business around the world to attract clients in ways never thought possible today.

QuickTime is a powerful tool used today to make videos using screen capture and the camera in your computer to make very powerful and compelling videos. The best part is that if you own a Mac, the application is already in your computer, and if you have a Windows operating system you can get it for under $20 dollars.

If you are on a budget and would like to get started in creating amazing videos, this is the course for you. Take advantage of my prior experience with successfully creating amazing QuickTime videos as I let you in all the secrets of creating amazing videos spending little or no money at all. No prior experience necessary. I will take you through the basics of creating a great video presentation using QuickTime and get you on your way to reaching your target audience successfully!!


In this A-Z guide to producing professional videos using QuickTime we will cover, through a series of easy to follow videos:

1-What is QuickTime and why it is a great teaching tool.

2. How to create screen capture videos using QuickTime.

3. How to Create videos of a Keynote or Power Point presentation with great sounding audio using QuickTime.

4. How to create audio recordings using QuickTime and how to achieve amazing audio quality.

5. How to create talking head lecture videos using QuickTime.

6. How to create videos of your i-phone or i-pad screen using QuickTime

If you are on a budget and would like to get started in creating amazing videos, this is the course for you. Take advantage of my prior experience with successfully creating amazing QuickTime lecture videos as I let you in all the secrets of creating amazing videos spending little or no money at all. No prior experience necessary. I will take you through the basics of creating a great movie presentation using QuickTime and get you on your way to reaching your target audience successfully!!
title: How to create an awesome demo video with Quicktime
